name: Men's TOESOUT "Jacked" Shirt
description:
Men's TOESOUT "Jacked" Shirt

Men's black heavy weight T- Shirt with TOESOUT Original "Jacked" design printed front and back.

The TOESOUT "Jacked" design is an original one of a kind hand drawn piece of artwork.  Inspired by our drink of choice we came up with this concept late one evening and it has become one of our favorite designs.  

Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. We picked these Ts for the Riders out there. We took no shortcuts with our Ts with multiple print locations, all have custom sewn on labels and printed logo and wash care instructions.


6 oz. 100% Cotton Tubular Jersey.* Double-needle bottom hem and sleeves. Shoulder-to-shoulder tape. Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

 Body Width: S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24", 2XL=26

name: TOESOUT -Originals- Black and Grey Hat
description:
"ToesOut Originals" Black and light grey hat

These hats have nice thick embroidery front and back. They stand out, fit nice, and dont fall apart if you are forced to tuck them under your helmet as we tend to do.

Black with light grey and white embroidery and light grey bill.

210 Fitted by FLEXFIT

One size fits all normal sized heads...

 (your standard flex fit hats will fit heads between 7-8)

 83% acrilic / 15% wool / 2% spandex

name: Ladies TOESOUT "Rider" Thermal
description:
Ladies TOESOUT "Rider" Thermal

Ladies Soft Long Sleeve Thermal with Original TOESOUT "Rider" image designed by bay area tattoo great Ben Corn.

-These thermals are slim fitting, and from what the girls say, they run small and tight ..go up a  size or two from your normal for a comfortable fit.

-preshrunk 60% cotton / 40% polyester baby thermal
-5.4-oz.
-self-fabric collar and cuffs
-custom printed label and sewn label on shirt front

Sizing:

Size        Chest          Body Length         Sleeve Length
  S           29 1/2            25 3/8                   23 7/8
  M           31 1/2            26                         24 1/2
  L            33 1/2            26 5/8                   25 1/8
  XL          35 3/4            27 1/4                   25 3/4       
  
*Model wearing Large

name: Ladies TOESOUT "Bear" Shirt
description:
Ladies TOESOUT "Bear" Tee Shirt

White, Ladies Poly/Cotton T-Shirt with TOESOUT original "bear" design by Tattoo legend Ben Corn.  

Being a California based company we had to add a bear in the line and Ben Corn nailed this design with the angry flash inspired bear with the old school block lettering. 

-These t-shirts fit slim and run small, girls are going up at least 1 size on these ...

-Self Fabric & Neck: combed poly/cotton jersey 40 singles 120g 
3.5 oz 65% poly 35% cotton

-custom TOESOUT printed label and sew tag on shirt front

SIZE     NECK     CHEST     LENGTH    SLEEVE LENGTH
  S        6 3/4         31         25 3/8           4 3/4
  M          7             33           26                  5
  L         7 1/4         35         26 5/8           5 1/4
  XL       7 1/4         38         27 1/4           5 1/2

*Model wearing Large

name: Ladies TOESOUT "Jacked" Tank-Grey
description:
Ladies TOESOUT "Jacked" Racerback Tank

Womens Burnout Racerback Tank with TOESOUT original "Jacked" design. Our racerback tanks are semi-sheer with shades of black and grey. They feature our Jacked logo printed in grey and look awesome. We strategically added our sew tag on the back for a slick clean look. These are sexy and sellin quick!
 
 -This tank is slim fitting and runs really small, our girls are going up 2 sizes on these tanks...

-preshrunk 65% poly / 35% cotton, 3.7-oz, 30 singles for extreme softness, 1x1 burnout baby rib-knit binding.

-Custom TOESOUT printed label and sewn tag on back of tank.

Sizing:

Size   /   Chest  /  Body Length   /  Shoulder Strap
  S            29           26 1/2                    7/8
  M            31             27                         1
  L             33          27 1/2                   1 1/8
  XL           36             28                       1 1/4


*Models wearing Med and Large

name: TOESOUT Beanies
description:
TOESOUT Beanies 

7 inch flex fit beanies featuring TOESOUT original crossed skeletal feet sew tag. these arent the cheap itchy beanies everyones givin out these days, they are warm and cover nicely for those brisk evening rides.

Available in black and grey.

name: Ladies TOESOUT "Ride-Or-Die" V-neck Shirt
description:
Ladies TOESOUT "Ride-or-Die" V-neck shirt:

Ladies light weight T- Shirt with TOESOUT Original "Ride Or Die" design printed on side.  Heather grey color shirt.

The TOESOUT "Ride Or Die"design is an original, one of a kind, hand drawn piece of artwork by Tattoo legend Ben Corn.This design was inspired by World War II air craft artwork and was brilliantly flipped by Ben Corn to have that biker feel with the skid lid and KDs. 

4.3 oz 100% Combed Ringspun Cotton. Super-soft with a slight stretch for a perfect fit. Machine washable. 
Custom TOESOUT printed label and sew tag on shirt front

*This shirt runs true to fit. In picture model wearing Medium
-Body Width: S=14 ½”, M=15 ¾”,L=16 ¼”, XL=17 ¼”,2XL=18 ¾”

name: TOESOUT "Rider" Patches
description:
TOESOUT "RIDER" PATCHES

4 inch circular patches featuring our TOESOUT "Rider" image with embroidered white border. Throw one on your cut, your bag, or wherever your storing those patches...

name: Ladies TOESOUT " Rider"  Zip Hoody
description:
Black Unisex Zip Hooded Sweatshirt.

Black Hooded sweatshirt with white draw strings featuring TOESOUT original "Rider" design printed on the back and the same design on a patch sewn on the front chest.

TOESOUT original "Rider" image was designed by tattoo great Ben Corn with a sick skeletal rider with the toes facing the right direction...out! This design is great and transfered great onto the custom patches we had sewn on the front of every hoody.

 ( unisex sweatshirts fit true for females and run small for males)



7oz, 80% Cotton/20% Polyester  Unisex zip hooded sweatshirt made from premium, super soft, lightweight fleece offering a slim fit and quality construction.Finished with plastic-tipped white round drawcord, white #5 kissing coilzipper, nickel zipper pull and eyelets and 1x1 ribbing at cuffs, waistband and pocket openings.

- 7 oz pre-laundered 80% cotton 20% polyester fleece
- 100% cotton 40 singles face yarn for supreme printability and softness
- Split stitch double needle sewing on all seams
- Twill neck tape

name: Men's TOESOUT "Trademark" Shirt
description:
Men's TOESOUT "Trademark" T-Shirt

Men's Grey heavy weight T- Shirt with TOESOUT Original "Trademark" design printed front and back.

TOESOUT "trademark" tee features our one of a kind crossed skeletal feet logo printed light grey on the darker grey tee with the top and bottom rockers on the back. 

Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. We picked these Ts for the Riders out there. We took no shortcuts with our Ts with multiple print locations, all have custom sewn on labels and printed logo and wash care instructions.

description:

100% Cotton, 6.1 OZ. Heavy Weight T
Rider logo, front and back. Large TOESOUT across shoulder blades in script with enlarged Rider logo on back.
ToesOut sew patch on front, lower corner

Perfect wear for riding.. 
Custom design and logo
True to fit

name: Men's TOESOUT "Give Back" Shirt
description:
Men's TOESOUT "Give Back" T-Shirt

***Proceeds from this shirt are donated to Bay area charitys in need, in the name of giving back to our community...

We, even before creating this line, have been helping out in our community, adopting blocks to cleanup, raising food and funds for shelters, donating more than anything else...time... to people and areas in need. We felt it was important to incorporate this sence of giving back into this line... hence our "Give Back" shirt, besides being a great looking design with script work from tattoo legend Ben Corn, it is meant to inspire and raise awareness that you dont have to be a superstar to help your community, you just have to be willing to donate some time. 

(check out our facebook for more on giving back)



Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. We picked these Ts for the Riders out there. We took no shortcuts with our Ts with multiple print locations, all have custom sewn on labels and printed logo and wash care instructions.


6 oz. 100% Cotton Tubular Jersey.* Double-needle bottom hem and sleeves. Shoulder-to-shoulder tape. Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

 Body Width: S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24", 2XL=26

name: Men's TOESOUT "Rider" Shirt
description:
Men's TOESOUT "Rider" T-Shirt

Men's black heavy weight T- Shirt with TOESOUT Original "Rider" design printed front and back.

The TOESOUT "Rider" design is an original, one of a kind, hand-drawn piece of artwork by Tattoo legend Ben Corn. I met with Ben and told him we needed a design that showed what toesout was all about, and he nailed it. This sick skeletal riding beast is riding the way we all should ...toesout! We printed this image as large as we could on the back of these tees to be seen while riding, but please prepare yourselves for honks and high fives while wearing this one...

Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. We picked these Ts for the Riders out there. We took no shortcuts with our Ts with multiple print locations, all have custom sewn on labels and printed logo and wash care instructions.


6 oz. 100% Cotton Tubular Jersey.* Double-needle bottom hem and sleeves. Shoulder-to-shoulder tape. Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

 Body Width: S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24", 2XL=26

Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. name: Men's TOESOUT "Bear" Shirt
description:
Men's TOESOUT "Bear" T-Shirt

Men's white heavy weight T- Shirt with TOESOUT Original "Bear" design printed front and back.

The TOESOUT "Bear" design is an original one of a kind hand drawn piece of artwork by Tattoo legend Ben Corn.  Being a Californian company we wanted to throw California's mascot  in the mix and had Ben Corn do this flash tattoo inspired angry ass bear with some old school blocked out lettering. This shirt is bad and really pops on the white tee.

Our Mens Ts are heavy weight, with a nice thick collar that wont stretch out after 2 wears, they run true to size, and wont fall apart after just a few washes. We picked these Ts for the Riders out there. We took no shortcuts with our Ts with multiple print locations, all have custom sewn on labels, and printed logo and wash care instructions.
